obfuscation: ﻿ To evaluate my own skills in reading , writing , speaking and listening to English For getting a perfection in the English language more than going for holidays to Great Britain is needed .
original: ﻿ To evaluate my own skills in reading, writing, speaking and listening to English  For getting a perfection in the English language more than going for holidays to Great Britain is needed.

obfuscation: When you have learned how to write , read , speak and listen to English , then you are a lot closer the goal to get perfection in the language .
original: When you have learned how to write, read, speak and listen to English, then you are much closer the goal to get perfection in the language.

obfuscation: The difficulty in evaluating your own skills in English is not to think of what you do know but what you do not know .
original: The difficulty in evaluating your own skills in English is not to think of what you do know but what you do not know.

obfuscation: For instance , sometimes I do not know the tense of the verb in a sentence and if I am not aware of it then I can not correct it .
original: For instance, sometimes I do not know the tense of the verb in a sentence and if I am not aware of it then I can not correct it.

obfuscation: One way of getting around the problem is to get aware by reading and learning the English grammer .
original: One way of getting around the problem is to get aware by reading and learning the English grammer.

obfuscation: 1 Read I started reading English at fourth class in compulsory school .
original: 1 Read  I started reading English at fourth class in compulsory school.

obfuscation: At the time I was quite shy and did not talk a lot during class hour , except if I was asked a question .
original: At the time I was quite shy and did not talk much during class hour, except if I was asked a question.

obfuscation: Much later in life after I had studied French in 1995 , I did join a course in English at the Folkuniversitetet in Uppsala .
original: Much later in life after I had studied French in 1995, I did join a course in English at the Folkuniversitetet in Uppsala.

obfuscation: The purpose was to get a `` First Certificate '' in the English language .
original: The aim was to get a "First Certificate" in the English language.

obfuscation: I managed the examination and got an modal grade .
original: I managed the examination and got an average grade.

obfuscation: The reading part of the exam included reading short stories and answering questions about the stories .
original: The reading part of the exam included reading short stories and answering questions about the stories.

obfuscation: I can not say that I have a trouble with reading English .
original: I can not say that I have a problem with reading English.

obfuscation: English and American literature is familiar from courses I have taken in business economics for 2 years now at the University .
original: English and American literature is familiar from courses I have taken in business economics for 2 years now at the University.

obfuscation: However , I could learn reading faster as I get to know more English words by looking more thoroughly in the dictionary .
original: However, I could learn reading faster as I get to know more English words by looking more thoroughly in the dictionary.

obfuscation: Another way to practice reading language is reading more English novels and quality newspapers .
original: Another way to practice reading language is reading more English novels and quality newspapers.

obfuscation: 2 Write The biggest trouble for me when I translate from Swedish to English is that I think of how the sentence is written in Swedish .
original: 2 Write  The biggest problem for me when I translate from Swedish to English is that I think of how the sentence is written in Swedish.

obfuscation: I consider the problem is that I translate the English sentence due to how I think in Swedish .
original: I consider the problem is that I translate the English sentence due to how I think in Swedish.

obfuscation: I do sometimes have a trouble with tense , mode and clause elements in the English grammer .
original: I do sometimes have a problem with tense, mode and clause elements in the English grammer.

obfuscation: For writing correct sentences it is essential to know the clause elements and early important grammer .
original: For writing correct sentences it is essential to know the clause elements and other important grammer.

obfuscation: The positive point is that technical terms in business economics have been enriched in my English language .
original: The positive point is that technical terms in business economics have been enriched in my English language.

obfuscation: One of my future goals is to be better in writing English .
original: One of my future goals is to be better in writing English.

obfuscation: The main object is to get or take time for repetition of the English grammer and especially work with what I already mentioned having a problem with .
original: The main object is to have or take time for repetition of the English grammer and especially work with what I already mentioned having a problem with.

obfuscation: 3 Speak I think I have improved speaking English since I took two business economics courses in Market System and International Marketing .
original: 3 Speak  I think I have improved speaking English since I took two business economics courses in Market System and International Marketing.

obfuscation: I followed the International Marketing course before December and I had to talk English all the time .
original: I followed the International Marketing course before December and I had to talk English all the time.

obfuscation: Most of the students could not speak Swedish so English was the only language the international exchange students could speak , except their mother tongue .
original: Most of the students could not speak Swedish so English was the only language the international exchange students could speak, except their mother tongue.

obfuscation: Speaking English in a proper means need knowledge about sentence structure and the right English expressions that I am about to learn .
original: Speaking English in a proper way need knowledge about sentence structure and the right English expressions that I am about to learn.

obfuscation: Some years ago I bought a dictionary in a bookstore that helped to translate from English to French / French to English .
original: Some years ago I bought a dictionary in a bookstore that helped to translate from English to French / French to English.

obfuscation: Ever since I have thought that I some day will know how to translate without difficulty from one of the languages to the early .
original: Ever since I have thought that I some day will know how to translate without difficulty from one of the languages to the other.

obfuscation: 4 Listen To understand a language other than your mother tongue is not so easy but it is easy to listen and understand than reading , writing and speaking it .
original: 4 Listen  To understand a language other than your mother tongue is not so easy but it is easier to listen and understand than reading, writing and speaking it.

obfuscation: y skills in listening to British English are full but my understanding of other English speaking languages varies due to the accent .
original: y skills in listening to British English are good but my understanding of other English speaking languages varies due to the accent.

obfuscation: In the Market System course that I noted earlier , we had a man from California as our lecturer .
original: In the Market System course that I mentioned earlier, we had a man from California as our lecturer.

obfuscation: The trouble was that most of the Swedish students including me did not understand every tenth world he said because of his particular accent .
original: The problem was that most of the Swedish students including me did not understand every tenth world he said because of his particular accent.

obfuscation: Listening to another language also need a lot of patience .
original: Listening to another language also need a lot of patience.

obfuscation: In return you can get a very nice English accent , if you listen carefully to British English .
original: In return you can get a very nice English accent, if you listen carefully to British English.
